metadata.description: Escaping the stresses of city life, a young, single mom visits the hurricane state, only to find that Florida can be a pretty scary place—swamps, alligators, bugs the size of small cars, and zombies. With a weed-whacker for a weapon and the world against her, this punk-rock mommy will take down every monster in the state if need be. Is Florida really haunted by the undead, or is it just in her head? Collects issues #1-#5 of the cult classic series by Dry County creator Rich Tommaso, and featuring new cover art, fully colored and collected in a deluxe format for the first time, and featuring two bonus stories.
metadata.name: The Horror of Collier County
